Prophetic Certainty.name: Prophetic Certainty
Prophetic Certainty.flavor: Buoyed by a succession of victories, you unleash a potent attack.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You gain a bonus to your next attack roll before the end of your next turn. The bonus is equal to +2 per milestone that you’ve reached since your last extended rest.
